texts: Transport Trading Limied (TTL) is the holding company for all the operating transport companies owned by TfL. It also carries out certain other trading activities. It receives the revenues from the sales of travelcards in connection with all forms of transport operated by TfL.
To find out what information TTL makes available, please select a category from below
